title: Wtb: T206 hal chase blue portrait or any other pose raw
author: rp12367

posts.post_title: Wtb: T206 hal chase blue portrait or any other pose raw
posts.post_content: Still looking to buy a HAL CHASE Blue Portrait, Pink Portrait or Throwing either cap or trophy Raw, would like a crease free, lower to mid grade any back 25-40 range... Need as a gift, going to a good home, my brother for his b-day in 2 weeks....Please let me know if anyone can help... Thanks Ralph
I think this Chase meets your criteria.  no creases.  aside from that spot on his face and a light stain  -it is a very clean and firm card.   $55ppd.  let me know if you're interested.    thanks

Sorry guys still new the board, should have stated that seeing as he is a none collector, I was hoping to spark his interest, I am looking to spend around 30-40 just didn't want a piece of junk, that was all i saw on e-bay... looking lower end, but somewhat nice... I appreciate any help.... Thanks again Ralph
Send me your email and I will send you a scan.  Bill Brown

I have one raw Chase blue port.  Technically it's vg/ex but presents even nicer.  Polar Bear back.  - $65 shipping on me.

Regards,
Scott Levy
